headline.main: Newspaper Men in London Call on Bevin To Retract His Alleged Slur on the Press

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Oct. 1 -- A committee of the Central London Branch of the National Union of Journalists today unanimously passed a resolution calling upon Ernest Bevin, Minister of Labor, to withdraw the remark, "I don't trust the press," alleged to have been made before 6,000 women war workers when he recently addressed them here at a meeting closed to the press.
abstract: Natl Journalists Union Central London Branch com resolution asks Min Bevin to retract alleged slur on press
